channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Usage limits in Todoist
item.description:
Usage limits in Todoist

Some usage limits depend on your plan, while others apply to everyone. In this article, you can find everything about your general account limits, and the limits that are increased when you upgrade to Todoist Pro or Todoist Business.
These are the Todoist limits, for free and pro plans, for your consideration.
item.content:encoded:
Usage limits in Todoist

Some usage limits depend on your plan, while others apply to everyone. In this article, you can find everything about your general account limits, and the limits that are increased when you upgrade to Todoist Pro or Todoist Business.
These are the Todoist limits, for free and pro plans, for your consideration.

item.title: D-Tale The Best Library To Perform Exploratory Data Analysis Using Single Line Of Code
item.description:
D-Tale The Best Library To Perform Exploratory Data Analysis Using Single Line Of Code

In this video I am going to discuss about pandas visual analysis where we will perform EDA in a single line of code.
More study materials about Python, data analysis, and D-Tale.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JJ8TNEPYQ71ZFKY57TAHM61P
item.description: @jleverenz I used to keep coming back to #RememberTheMilk for a very long time. But I think now I’m ready to move on to #Todoist. Their API is more robust, and the documentation is aplenty.
item.content:encoded: @jleverenz I used to keep coming back to #RememberTheMilk for a very long time. But I think now I’m ready to move on to #Todoist. Their API is more robust, and the documentation is aplenty.

item.title: Every ChatGPT GUI
item.description:
Every ChatGPT GUI

Every front-end GUI client for ChatGPT, Claude, and other LLMs
Take your pick for which GUI you want to use.
item.content:encoded:
Every ChatGPT GUI

item.title: LibreChat: Enhanced ChatGPT Clone
item.description:
LibreChat: Enhanced ChatGPT Clone

Features Agents, Anthropic, AWS, OpenAI, Assistants API, Azure, Groq, o1, GPT-4o, Mistral, OpenRouter, Vertex AI, Gemini, Artifacts, AI model switching, message search, Code Interpreter, langchain, DALL-E-3, OpenAPI Actions, Functions, Secure Multi-User Auth, Presets, open-source for self-hosting.
Another alternative that’ll work with Claude AI API.
item.content:encoded:
LibreChat: Enhanced ChatGPT Clone

Features Agents, Anthropic, AWS, OpenAI, Assistants API, Azure, Groq, o1, GPT-4o, Mistral, OpenRouter, Vertex AI, Gemini, Artifacts, AI model switching, message search, Code Interpreter, langchain, DALL-E-3, OpenAPI Actions, Functions, Secure Multi-User Auth, Presets, open-source for self-hosting.
Another alternative that’ll work with Claude AI API.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JJ8RJ32X92JW5K6WNKDTT1D0
item.description:
The Philippine real estate sector, once a key economic driver, is now struggling with rising vacancies, excess inventory, and weakening demand, suggesting it is in the hyper-supply phase. Developers face financial pressure from slower sales and cash inflows, increasing reliance on debt. A potential recession looms, but it may also present opportunities for investors to acquire undervalued assets. business.inquirer.net/∞

It is high time that someone point this out. Keep your liquidity high people. We’re watching out!
item.content:encoded:
The Philippine real estate sector, once a key economic driver, is now struggling with rising vacancies, excess inventory, and weakening demand, suggesting it is in the hyper-supply phase. Developers face financial pressure from slower sales and cash inflows, increasing reliance on debt. A potential recession looms, but it may also present opportunities for investors to acquire undervalued assets. business.inquirer.net/∞

It is high time that someone point this out. Keep your liquidity high people. We’re watching out!

item.title: Big AGI
item.description:
Big AGI

AI suite powered by state-of-the-art models and providing advanced AI/AGI functions. It features AI personas, AGI functions, multi-model chats, text-to-image, voice, response streaming, code highlighting and execution, PDF import, presets for developers, much more. Deploy on-prem or in the cloud.
This could be the front end we need for Claude AI API.
item.content:encoded:
Big AGI

AI suite powered by state-of-the-art models and providing advanced AI/AGI functions. It features AI personas, AGI functions, multi-model chats, text-to-image, voice, response streaming, code highlighting and execution, PDF import, presets for developers, much more. Deploy on-prem or in the cloud.
This could be the front end we need for Claude AI API.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JJ8PVMZRVKRAEEP4CNQW32HQ
item.description:
I use #LinkDing a lot, but as a bookmark application. But it wouldn’t hurt as well to use it to maintain a list of my #Selfhosted apps.

LinkDing - Why I Gave Up Fancy Dashboards For A Simple Bookmark Application noted.lol/∞

item.title: D-Tale
item.description:
D-Tale

Visualizer for pandas data structures. Contribute to man-group/dtale development by creating an account on GitHub.
We need to learn this in order to advance our knowledge about data analysis in Python.
item.content:encoded:
D-Tale

Visualizer for pandas data structures. Contribute to man-group/dtale development by creating an account on GitHub.
We need to learn this in order to advance our knowledge about data analysis in Python.
